text:
Release to be presented at the Mobile World Congress (MWC 2024) in Barcelona featuring enhanced data Ownership & Control:
Enhanced SRM (Sharekey Rights Management):
 Gain complete control over your data with the ability to share files and folders as "View Only" including strict restrictions such as NO screenshot, NO download, NO resharing, NO printing,... ensuring your content to remain confidential and secure.
Enhanced Share Extension:
 Seamlessly share content from other apps (a website in Safari, a photo in Photos or a document in Files) directly to SHAREKEY. Now with integrated SRM Rights, your shared content is protected under your specified conditions.

 This latest innovation elevates your data privacy and sharing capabilities.
